settings.form_description: Please select the product options listed above - a representative from Johnny Dang & Co. will give you a quote & help you customize your bracelet within 3-5 days of completing your $500 deposit.
settings.deposit_info: The deposit will be applied to the final cost of the bracelet.
settings.terms_conditions: You must pay a $500 deposit to inquire about a custom bracelet. You will be provided with consultation, a quote and 3D rendering for your custom design piece. The deposit is Non-Refundable if we have started production on the custom piece. Custom Pieces are Final Sale.
